paragraph.paragraph: To evaluate a metric over a scope:

list.item: Select the Metric Evaluation tab from the Metric tool.
Define the scope by adding either groups, classes or features to the input domain list.
Select a metric from the list of available metrics.
Click the Run selected metric button and the result will appear in the Value text field.

paragraph.paragraph:
You can get more information about the evaluated metric. See
40_viewing_measure_details.xml detailing a measure .
paragraph.warning: Caution: When calculated, a measure is not saved.
